titles.title: A resolution recognizing The American Legion for 100 years of service to veterans and members of the Armed Forces in the United States and their families.
A resolution recognizing The American Legion for 100 years of service to veterans and members of the Armed Forces in the United States and their families.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the American Legion for a century of service to veterans and members of the U.S. Armed Forces and their families.
Designates the week of August 24 through August 30, 2018, as American Legion Week.
